trans-unit.source: Represents a line annotation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation"></xref> class.
This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the position alignment of an annotation to the anchor point.

The annotation must be anchored using either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
Its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> properties must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the annotation alignment to the anchor point.
Gets the type of annotation.
For internal use, should not be used.
The annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets a style for the anchor cap at the end of the annotation line.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the style to apply to the anchor cap at the end of the line.
This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether an infinite line should be drawn.
`True` if a line should be drawn infinitely through two points provided, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.
The width and height of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates.
By default, relative chart coordinates are used.
To use axes coordinates for the annotation size, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.

Then anchor the annotation to a data point or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.

`True` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height"></xref> of an annotation are always in chart relative coordinates, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a style for the anchor cap at the start of an annotation line.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the style to apply to the anchor cap at the start of the line.
This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TextStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
